name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remora Sonar - SMS for Expert Sales Teams

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sonar makes moving metal easier for car dealers. Use this Chrome extension to send texts and photos right from your CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sonar can bust your sales pipeline wide open and flood your showroom with new prospects.

This is the secret weapon that modern dealerships rely on to move more metal every month. When enabled, a convenient link to open phone numbers directly from Chrome into Sonar will be there. It really is that simple. Get this extension to get the most value from Sonar, the best texting and chat solution ever made for car dealers.

Optimal dealer operators use Sonar to:

- Respectfully follow up with prospects who are more receptive to text-based communications.
- Run sweepstakes and keyword-based special offers that make mountains of fresh, local leads.
- Confirm and reschedule test drive appointments via private and respectful texting.
- Make leads and supercharge events with exciting text-based drawings and sweepstakes.

Why Should Your Dealership Use Sonar?

It's simple: More sales get done when you give your audience what they want.

"90 percent of all text messages are read within three minutes." — Forbes magazine, 2019

"85 percent of mobile device users prefer a text from businesses over phone calls or emails." — AT&T Market Analysis, 2016

"SMS enjoys a whopping 98 percent open rate and 45 percent rate of response from customers, compared to a paltry 22 percent open rate and six percent response rate for marketed emails." — Gartner, 2018

Sonar is a lead-making machine that gracefully solves your dealership's texting needs and cleans up your advertising everywhere by funneling all consumer outreach directly to your well-known and trusted local phone number. Sonar automagically loads your number into your prospects' mobile phones and keeps all your chats with customers neatly stored in your existing CRM, rather than on your sales team's personal phones.

Bottom line? Sonar Apps and its companion Chrome extension work together seamlessly to make day-to-day life at the store a breeze. Built for winners, Sonar is the best SMS solution for car dealers that are serious about their managed pipeline.
